Package wonder

Class Wonder

java.lang.Object
wonder.Wonder
public class Wonder
extends java.lang.Object
Implementation of Wonders in the game. The several states of the wonders are represented by an ArrayList where each element of the List represents a state.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Effect> effects
    If the state of the wonder doesn't give a reward ( fixed ressources or points) it will give an effect (choice between a list of resources ).

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Wonder​(java.lang.String name)
    The wonder is parsed in the constructor from the json file

  • Field Details

    • effects

      public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Effect> effects
      If the state of the wonder doesn't give a reward ( fixed ressources or points) it will give an effect (choice between a list of resources ). These effects will be stored in that list.

  • Constructor Details

    • Wonder

      public Wonder​(java.lang.String name) throws java.io.IOException
      The wonder is parsed in the constructor from the json file
      Parameters:
      name - name of the wonder
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if wonder's file could not be accessed

    • canUpgrade

      public boolean canUpgrade​(java.util.EnumMap<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> playerResources)
      This function compares the player inventory with the current upgrade cost of the wonder.
      Parameters:
      playerResources - player owned resources
      Returns:
      if the player can build his wonder of not
